Title: Binary Serialization and Compression for Silverlight
Description: This project ports two useful libraries to Silverlight:  1. An adapted version of Alt.Serializer enables binary serialization, and 2. A modified version of MiniLZO provides compression.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project ports two useful libraries to Silverlight: 1. An adapted version of Alt.Serializer enables binary serialization, and 2. A modified version of MiniLZO provides compression.

Original Alt.Serializer by neocognitron (http://www.codeproject.com/KB/cs/AltSerializer.aspx)
Original LZO .NET port by Astaelan (http://www.codeproject.com/KB/recipes/managedlzo.aspx)
